physical_appearance: This is a pair of square-toe slippers. It is couched with metallic threads to create a floral background. There is also an embroided floral motif in the centre, surrounded by a bordered pattern.
sgcool_label_text: This pair of square-toe slippers is couched with metallic threads to create a floral background. Metallic thread is also used to embroider the raised floral motif in the centre and border patterns. Such shoes were worn in the early 1900s but quickly fell out of favour in the Straits Settlements. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
title_text: Embroidered Slippers with Central Floral Motif in Metallic Thread
subject_terms_2: Women's shoes Peranakan (Asian people) Motifs Embroidery
